SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Interface RichSegment

All Known Implementing Classes:
HyperlinkSegment, ImageSegment, TextSegment
public sealed interface RichSegment permits TextSegment, ImageSegment, HyperlinkSegment
Represents a rich content segment that can be rendered within a custom styled text area.

A RichSegment defines the basic contract for various types of segments, such as TextSegment, ImageSegment, and HyperlinkSegment, which are permitted to implement this sealed interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    javafx.scene.Node
    createNode(TextStyle style)
    Creates a JavaFX Node to visually represent this segment using the given text style.
    int
    length()
    Returns the length of this segment in terms of content units.

  • Method Details

    • length

      int length()
      Returns the length of this segment in terms of content units.

      For text-based segments, this typically corresponds to the number of characters. For non-text segments such as images, this may return 1 to indicate a single unit.

      Returns:
      the logical length of the segment

    • createNode

      javafx.scene.Node createNode(TextStyle style)
      Creates a JavaFX Node to visually represent this segment using the given text style.
      Parameters:
      style - the TextStyle to apply when rendering the node
      Returns:
      a JavaFX Node representing this segment
